Card.Name: Barrier of bones
Card.RulesText: Defender When Barrier of Bones enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Card.Name: Ulamog's crusher
Card.RulesText: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.

Card.Name: Thran temporal gateway
Card.RulesText: {4}, {T}: You may put a historic permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

Card.Name: Dark ritual
Card.RulesText: Add {B}{B}{B}.

Card.Name: Divest
Card.RulesText: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Golgari thug
Card.RulesText: When Golgari Thug dies, put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Dredge 4 (If you would draw a card, you may mill four cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

Card.Name: Fulminator mage
Card.RulesText: Sacrifice Fulminator Mage: Destroy target nonbasic land.

Card.Name: Knight of malice
Card.RulesText: First strike Hexproof from white (This creature can't be the target of white spells or abilities your opponents control.) Knight of Malice gets +1/+0 as long as any player controls a white permanent.

Card.Name: Sparring construct
Card.RulesText: When Sparring Construct dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Card.Name: Platinum emperion
Card.RulesText: Your life total can't change. (You can't gain or lose life. You can't pay any amount of life except 0.)

Card.Name: Urza's mine
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

Card.Name: Drill bit
Card.RulesText: Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Card.Name: Icy manipulator
Card.RulesText: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

Card.Name: Reanimate
Card.RulesText: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

Card.Name: Entomb
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Mishra's helix
Card.RulesText: {X}, {T}: Tap X target lands.

Card.Name: Crucible of Worlds
Card.RulesText: You may play lands from your graveyard.

Card.Name: Kokusho, the Evening star
Card.RulesText: Flying When Kokusho, the Evening Star dies, each opponent loses 5 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

Card.Name: Artisan of kozilek
Card.RulesText: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

Card.Name: Urza's power plant
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

Card.Name: Mishra's Factory
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Urza's tower
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

Card.Name: Kozilek, butcher of truth
Card.RulesText: When you cast this spell, draw four cards. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Kozilek, Butcher of Truth is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

Card.Name: Myr servitor
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is on the battlefield, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from their graveyard to the battlefield.

Card.Name: Dead weight
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

Card.Name: Wand of vertebrae
Card.RulesText: {T}: Mill a card. {2}, {T}, Exile Wand of Vertebrae: Shuffle up to five target cards from your graveyard into your library.

Card.Name: Lotus petal
Card.RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Scroll rack
Card.RulesText: {1}, {T}: Exile any number of cards from your hand face down. Put that many cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then look at the exiled cards and put them on top of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Dowsing dagger
Card.RulesText: undefined

Card.Name: Thespian's stage
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.
